scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/network.template.ts > src/network.ts
scripts.prepare:goerli: mustache config/goerli.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli.json src/network.template.ts > src/network.ts
scripts.prepare:goerli:alphav3: mustache config/goerli_alpha_v3.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/goerli_alpha_v3.json src/network.template.ts > src/network.ts
